Jack Andrew Lowden is a Scottish actor with two BAFTAs, a Laurence Olivier Award, and nominations for a Golden Globe and Primetime Emmy. Lowden portrayed an earlier embodiment of [[Sauron]] in the second season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' on Amazon Prime.
